00021 class ConsoleCommand
00022 {
00023 public:
00024         virtual const char* getName() = 0;
00025         virtual const char* getShortDescription() = 0;
00026         virtual const char* getFullDescription() = 0;
00027         virtual void Execute(CConsoleBundle& console, const char** args, size_t nargs) = 0;
00028 
00029 protected:
00030         com_ptr<IBundle> getBundleFromParam(CConsoleBundle& console, const char* id);
00031         std::string getStateName(EBundleState state);
00032 };

00036 class CmdHelp : public ConsoleCommand
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         virtual const char* getName() { return "help"; }
00040         virtual const char* getShortDescription() { return "Displays this message"; }
00041         virtual const char* getFullDescription() 
00042         { 
00043                 return 
00044 "help [command]\n\n\
00045 Displays available commands with short descriptions.\n\
00046 If command parameter is provided displays detailed help on this command."; 
00047         }
00048         virtual void Execute(CConsoleBundle& console, const char** args, size_t nargs);
00049 };

00054 {
00055 public:
00056         virtual const char* getName() { return "ss"; }

00060                 return 
00061 "ss ID | Name\n\n\
00062 Lists status of all registered bundles in current framework instance.\n\
00063 If bundle ID or symbolic name is specified prints detailed info on the bundle."; 
00064         }

00066 };
